title: Ferrari Prank! Art Cars of 2022, Q&A
description:
The Ferrari gets pranked! Zack walks us through the incredible art cars of Burning Man, from an aquatic predator to the most amazing bar on wheels. Then we answer questions about the best daily/track 4-door (CT4-V or RS3?); what track days do to your leased car; the best wagon for AWD hyper-miling; California's ICE ban; and the best car for a road-trip threesome (really).
 

Recorded September 8, 2022

 

See the art cars: https://www.forbes.com/sites/jimdobson/2022/08/02/burning-man-2022-inside-the-outrageous-mutant-cars-of-the-future/?sh=41ab03ca1bb4

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire16 and use code smokingtire16 for 16 free meals across 7 boxes AND 3 free gifts!
 

FIND BERRYMAN AT ALL MAJOR AUTOMOTIVE RETAILERS. FOR MORE INFORMATION, GO TO BERRYMANPRODUCTS.COM.

 

Use Off The Record! and ALWAYS fight your tickets! Enter code TST10 for a 10% discount on your first case on the Off The Record app, or go to http://www.offtherecord.com/TST.

 

Want your question answered? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast


 

Tweet at us!

https://www.Twitter.com/thesmokingtire

https://www.Twitter.com/zackklapman


 

Instagram:

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
